font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 垃圾，废物： discarded or useless material
【例】 The front lawn was littered with the raffle that the workers had left behind. 前院的草坪上满是工人们丢的垃圾。
【近】 chaff, deadwood, debris, dreck, dross, effluvium[ɪ'fluːvɪəm]恶臭, litter, offal, offscouring, refuse, riffraff, rubbish, scrap, spilth
【记】 rifle 步枪，抢劫→最光明正大的抢劫就是彩票
